review: Unfortunately, it was back ordered and then it came one day too late for me to take to my vacation home where I had planned to use it. I did try it out at a friend's house. And did get to set up my amazon prime and several other apps, as well as upload pictures to Amazon photo storage to view on the tv. Pandora and online radio stations were easy to use.  It did seem to freeze once, and did not respond to up/down or any buttons on the app. Unplugged it and turned off tv and then back on and it worked. It looks like it will be useful  at some point, as I I needed to buy a different unit (dvd with wifi) for my vacation home since the fire stick did not arrive on time. It took 4 days after they said it would ship so I was disappointed that it arrived after I left home. (was still within the time frame given for backorder). I do not have tvs at my house with the correct connections.
